name: Add Refiner survey responses as new rows into Google Sheets
description:
This template adds a new row into a Google Sheets spreadsheet as soon as a new survey response is collected by Refiner.

While setting up the template, you need to take a generated webhook URL from Make and use it in Integrations>Webhooks in the Refiner UI.

The template expects your Refiner survey to have these questions:
1) How disappointed would you be if you could no longer use our service?
2) NPS score

The template saves the responses to [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16C9YIPVkWiqvRpSInR43xWEDExZgvMNymBPv9Jemu7o/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet. You can make a copy of it for testing purposes.

Note that email values from Refiner will only be passed to Google Sheets if they are available for the particular survey submission.
